org.apache.beam.sdk.metrics

Class MetricsContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.beam.sdk.metrics.MetricsContainer

  • @Experimental(value=METRICS)
public class MetricsContainer
extends Object
    Holds the metrics for a single step and unit-of-commit (bundle).

    This class is thread-safe. It is intended to be used with 1 (or more) threads are updating metrics and at-most 1 thread is extracting updates by calling getUpdates() and commitUpdates(org.apache.beam.sdk.metrics.MetricsMap<org.apache.beam.sdk.metrics.MetricName, ? extends org.apache.beam.sdk.metrics.MetricCell<?, ?>>). Outside of this it is still safe. Although races in the update extraction may cause updates that don't actually have any changes, it will never lose an update.

    For consistency, all threads that update metrics should finish before getting the final cumulative values/updates.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MetricsContainer(String stepName)
      Create a new MetricsContainer associated with the given stepName.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void commitUpdates()
      Mark all of the updates that were retrieved with the latest call to getUpdates() as committed.
      org.apache.beam.sdk.metrics.CounterCell getCounter(MetricName metricName)
      Return the CounterCell that should be used for implementing the given metricName in this container.
      MetricUpdates getCumulative()
      Return the MetricUpdates representing the cumulative values of all metrics in this container.
      org.apache.beam.sdk.metrics.DistributionCell getDistribution(MetricName metricName) 
      MetricUpdates getUpdates()
      Return the cumulative values for any metrics that have changed since the last time updates were committed.
